feed.title: ToolJet Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.36.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Major updates üöÄ

  • feat: Table column redesign by @manishkushare in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8442
  • feat: Adding new color swatches and update new components with color variable by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8935
  • Superstore based state management architecture by @sherfin94 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8678
  • feat: Add light/dark/auto mode theme setting at application level by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9091

Enhancements and Bugfixes üí™ + üêû

  • fix : Module creation related bugs by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9308
  • feat: added support for annotation in plotly charts by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9160
  • fix :: Event triggering onclose of modal gets triggered on each refresh by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8388
  • fix: fixed icon image of queries in sidebar inspector by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8798
  • feat: [improvement] Component layout table : Add updatedAt column by @arpitnath in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9026
  • fix: Fixed inconsistent behaviour of check box inside ListView by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8855
  • feat : Updating commonly used components by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9023
  • fix: Update scroll bar styling for components by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8819
  • feat: Updating the format of the name of exported file in table component by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8885
  • fix: Removed extra border from black ghost button by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8782
  • fix: Improved widget and query search accuracy in Editor by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8899
  • feat: Null and empty string handling in table component by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8916
  • Fix : Table string column max height not getting applied , ui fixes in image column type by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9436
  • fix :Pagination component overflowing out of box by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9024
  • feat: Updated column background styles on resize of components by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8904
  • fix: show overloy on overflow for string, text and number cells in table by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9443
  • feat: Add "Mark all columns as editable" toggle in Table by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9053
  • Fix string text table column type not pasting in plain-text by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9471
  • fix: Fixed issues on Spanish translation file by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9472
  • fix : Muliselect table UI by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9474
  • feat: Update column name as per column in table by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9475
  • Fix : Boolean column type was not auto generated by @manishkushare in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9477
  • Fix: firefox not editing text and string column type by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9481
  • fix : Number input in table shows 2 arrows in firefox by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9483
  • Fix : Popup not showing for string column type for overflow content by @manishkushare in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9489
  • Release v2.36.0 - App builder 1.6 by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9444

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.35.4...v2.36.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.36.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: Buttons text alignment for homepage by @AnantshreeChandola in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9495

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.36.0...v2.36.1

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.37.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üöÄ Features

  • ToolJet Database queries for public apps by @akshaysasidrn in #9134 (#9067)

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Dark mode inconsistencies in ToolJet Database dashboard by @parthy007 in #9311 (#9276)

üìù Docs

  • Upgrade to Docusaurus v3 by @amanregu in #9397
  • Minor documentation fixes and updates

New Contributors

  • @prathamesh-sonpatki made their first contribution in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9375
  • @franz-josef-kaiser made their first contribution in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9373

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.36.1...v2.37.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.37.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Chore: updated superstore logic for state access @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9518
  • Fix : Replaced the icon of clear button in debugger to trash icon from right aligned icon by @manishkushare in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9528

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.37.0...v2.37.1

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.38.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Fix: The dashboard needs a refresh to get the add folder icon(+) back once the search icon is clicked by @609harsh in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9020
  • Fix: Notification modal resize by @Sadaf-A in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9448
  • Fix: Input field and cancel button should be disabled when an app import is in progress by @orinamio in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9446
  • Change a label related to workspace constants by @joelali5 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9218
  • Remove alternative styling for Workspace Constants header by @alewilliam789 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9284
  • Setting "#3A4251" as the highlight color for dark mode loading animation by @Sadaf-A in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9359
  • Apps card loading issue fix by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9519

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.37.0...v2.38.0
